Text:
...Anyone got a Viz collection they'd care to share? I've got a few print copies from about ten years ago, and just a bare few from TPB. Hell, I've found more back issues of Beano and Dandy, ferchrissakes! It's actually a pretty funny rag, and it's great for learning how to speak Limey, ennit?

So again, if you've got a collection, or know of a link that works, please pass it on!
